report.title: Autofeed samples for Elasticsearch (standard filters, sensitive only)
report.description: A list of samples designed for feeding into Elasticsearch or a similar JSON store. This report returns full precision copies of sensitive records.

column.name: day_of_year
column.sql: case s.date_type when 'D' then extract(doy from s.date_start) else null end

column.name: week
column.sql: case when coalesce(date_part('year', s.date_start), 0)=coalesce(date_part('year', s.date_end), 0) and coalesce(floor(extract(doy from s.date_start)/7+1), 0)=coalesce(floor(extract(doy from s.date_end)/7+1), 0) then coalesce(floor(extract(doy from s.date_start)/7+1), 0) else null end

column.name: ukbms_week
column.sql: case when coalesce(date_part('year', s.date_start), 0)=coalesce(date_part('year', s.date_end), 0) and floor((extract('doy' from s.date_start) - extract('doy' from (extract('year' from s.date_start) || '-04-01')::date))/7) = floor((extract('doy' from s.date_end) - extract('doy' from (extract('year' from s.date_end) || '-04-01')::date))/7) then floor((extract('doy' from s.date_start) - extract('doy' from (extract('year' from s.date_start) || '-04-01')::date))/7) + 1 else null end

column.name: month
column.sql: case when coalesce(date_part('year', s.date_start), 0)=coalesce(date_part('year', s.date_end), 0) and coalesce(date_part('month', s.date_start), 0)=coalesce(date_part('month', s.date_end), 0) then coalesce(date_part('month', s.date_start), 0) else null end

column.name: year
column.sql: case when coalesce(date_part('year', s.date_start), 0)=coalesce(date_part('year', s.date_end), 0) then coalesce(date_part('year', s.date_start), null) else null end

column.name: geom
column.sql: st_astext(st_removerepeatedpoints(st_transform(smp.geom, 4326)))

column.name: point
column.sql: st_y(st_transform(st_centroid(smp.geom), 4326))::text || ',' || st_x(st_transform(st_centroid(smp.geom), 4326))::text

column.name: map_sq_srid
column.sql: COALESCE(get_output_srid(smp.geom), 3857)

column.name: map_sq_1km
column.sql: CASE WHEN max_sensitivity_precision > 1000 THEN NULL ELSE TRIM(leading 'POINT(' FROM TRIM(trailing ')' FROM st_astext(st_centroid(st_transform(reduce_precision(smp.geom, false, 1000), 4326))))) END

column.name: map_sq_2km
column.sql: CASE WHEN max_sensitivity_precision > 2000 THEN NULL ELSE TRIM(leading 'POINT(' FROM TRIM(trailing ')' FROM st_astext(st_centroid(st_transform(reduce_precision(smp.geom, false, 2000), 4326))))) END

column.name: map_sq_10km
column.sql: CASE WHEN max_sensitivity_precision > 10000 THEN NULL ELSE TRIM(leading 'POINT(' FROM TRIM(trailing ')' FROM st_astext(st_centroid(st_transform(reduce_precision(smp.geom, false, 10000), 4326))))) END

column.name: coordinate_uncertainty_in_meters
column.sql: CASE WHEN s.sensitive OR s.private OR snf.entered_sref_system NOT SIMILAR TO '[0-9]+' THEN get_sref_precision(snf.public_entered_sref, snf.entered_sref_system, null) ELSE COALESCE(snf.attr_sref_precision, 50) END

column.name: indexed_location_ids
column.sql: array_to_string(s.location_ids, ',')

column.name: media_data
column.sql: CASE WHEN s.media_count>0 THEN (SELECT string_agg(sm.path || '~~' || COALESCE(sm.caption, '') || '~~' || COALESCE(l.code, '') || '~~' || COALESCE(t.term, ''), '@@') FROM sample_media sm LEFT JOIN licences l ON l.id=sm.licence_id LEFT JOIN cache_termlists_terms t ON t.id=sm.media_type_id WHERE sm.sample_id=s.id AND sm.deleted=false) ELSE null END

column.name: created_on
column.sql: to_char(s.created_on, 'yyyy-mm-dd HH24:MI:SS.MS')

column.name: updated_on
column.sql: to_char(s.updated_on, 'yyyy-mm-dd HH24:MI:SS.MS')

column.name: verified_on
column.sql: to_char(s.verified_on, 'yyyy-mm-dd HH24:MI:SS.MS')

column.name: sensitivity_precision
column.sql: greatest(os.max_sensitivity_precision, smp.privacy_precision)

column.name: sensitivity_blur
column.sql: CASE WHEN s.sensitive OR s.private THEN 'F' ELSE null END

column.name: release_status
column.description: Worst case release status from the contained occurrences
column.sql: CASE WHEN POSITION('U' IN os.all_release_status)<>0 THEN 'U' WHEN POSITION('P' IN os.all_release_status)<>0 THEN 'P' ELSE 'R' END
